lessons.name: Home Row Basics
lessons.text: ask sad fall jad; lass jak salad flask; sad lad ask fall;

lessons.name: E and R Keys
lessons.text: red sea fed read dear rare; ear ask sad red; fear lard read;

lessons.name: T and Y Keys
lessons.text: try sat yet rate tear; rest fast tart state; year stay tray;

lessons.name: Easy Top Row Words
lessons.text: type true quote quiet your tear pepper worry; power route error type;

lessons.name: Common English Words
lessons.text: the quick brown fox jumps over the lazy dog near the bank of the river; people always look for good food;

lessons.name: Z, X, C Keys
lessons.text: zoo zebra zap craze zero; exact toxic excel complex; civic cycle cello voice;

lessons.name: Long Paragraph
lessons.text: Programming is the process of creating a set of instructions that tell a computer how to perform a task. It often involves problem-solving and logic. Learning to code requires patience and practice, but it opens up many creative possibilities and career opportunities in technology and beyond. Debugging is a crucial part of the process.
